name: A Crow Story (BETA)
description:
This is made for Variety MegaJam 2021!! 
It's not finished, because December is the worst month of the year and i just had a handful of free days to dedicate to this... But I got a whole bunch of ideas, designs and assets for the remaining 8 levels, so I expect to get back to this during the (Southern Hemisfere's) summer. 

Hope you enjoy it so far anyway!!

Have a happy new year,

Mer
